body_html: Actually sorting them alphabetically might cause a cascade of a few functions overflowing every single block. It might be a better idea to use a deterministic hash function to split them into approximately equally sized files.
body_text: Actually sorting them alphabetically might cause a cascade of a few functions overflowing every single block. It might be a better idea to use a deterministic hash function to split them into approximately equally sized files.
body: Actually sorting them alphabetically might cause a cascade of a few functions overflowing every single block. It might be a better idea to use a deterministic hash function to split them into approximately equally sized files.
